txt.en: Forces of the Enemy approach the hillock as you seek to master your doubt and fear.
Forces of the Enemy approach the hillock as you seek to master your doubt and fear.
Book 6, Chapter 5: The Black Ships
Talk to
'Look for yourself!'
'Black sails on the river! The Corsairs of Umbar approach from the south-west!'
Talk to Éomer on the south-western outcropping of the hillock
'My eyes cannot believe what they see!'
Éomer stands on the rocky outcropping on the south-western corner of the hillock, but his mood is greatly changed.
'Black sails on the river! The Corsairs of Umbar approach from the south-west!'
'Black sails on the river! The Corsairs of Umbar approach!'

'My eyes cannot believe what they see, and yet they must. Another player has entered the field of battle, and he has thrown in his lot with Mordor. <rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> for yourself, [placeholder], and see that of which I speak!'
Defeat even more foes on the hillock ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat foes on the hillock ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'DNT - Blah!'
Defeat more foes on the hillock ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You see them too. Black sails on the river! The Corsairs of Umbar approach from the south-west!'

As you look at Éomer and see the despair in his eyes, you almost tell him that the ships are not sailed by Corsairs, for the Corsairs are slain and their leader Balakhôr will scourge no more. But then doubt gnaws in your mind. Aragorn intended to bring the ships north to Minas Tirith, but what if some evil befell him upon the river? What if some design of Sauron's lay in wait, ready to ensnare the Grey Company and their allies?

You hold your tongue, and seek to master your own mounting doubt and fear.
